verses.verse: בְּרֵאשִׁ֗ית <WH7225> In the beginning מַמְלֶ֛כֶת <WH4467> of the reign יְהוֹיָקִ֥ם <WH3079> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֹאושִׁיָּ֖הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah הָיָ֞ה <WH1961> came הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> came this word הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֔ה <WH3414> unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me עֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> to me Make לְךָ֔ מוֹסֵר֖וֹת <WH4147> thee bonds וּמֹט֑וֹת <WH4133> and yokes וּנְתַתָּ֖ם <WH5414> and put עַל־ <WH5921> on צַוָּארֶֽךָ׃ <WH6677> them upon thy neck

וְשִׁלַּחְתָּם֩ <WH7971> And send אֶל־ <WH413> about מֶ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> them to the king אֱד֜וֹם <WH123> of Edom וְאֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and to the king מוֹאָ֗ב <WH4124> of Moab וְאֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> and to the king בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וְאֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> and to the king צֹ֖ר <WH6865> of Tyrus וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and to the king צִיד֑וֹן <WH6721> of Zidon בְּיַ֤ד <WH3027> by the hand מַלְאָכִים֙ <WH4397> of the messengers הַבָּאִ֣ים <WH935> which come יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem אֶל־ <WH413> to צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> unto Zedekiah מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וְצִוִּיתָ֣ <WH6680> And command אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲדֹֽנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH113> unto their masters לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> them to say כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> thus תֹֽאמְר֖וּ <WH559> Thus shall ye say אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹֽנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH113> unto your masters

אָנֹכִ֞י <WH595> I עָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> I have made אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> the earth אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָדָ֤ם <WH120> the man וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> and the beast אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> are on פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> that [are] upon הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the ground בְּכֹחִי֙ <WH3581> power הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> by my great וּבִזְרוֹעִ֖י <WH2220> arm הַנְּטוּיָ֑ה <WH5186> and by my outstretched וּנְתַתִּ֕יהָ <WH5414> and have given לַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who יָשַׁ֥ר <WH3474> meet בְּעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> it unto whom it seemed

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I נָתַ֙תִּי֙ <WH5414> And now have I given אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאֲרָצ֣וֹת <WH776> all these lands הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these בְּיַ֛ד <WH3027> into the hand נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֥ר <WH5019> of Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon עַבְדִּ֑י <WH5650> my servant וְגַם֙ <WH1571> also אֶת־ <WH853> חַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> and the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> of the field נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> have I given ל֖וֹ לְעָבְדֽוֹ׃ <WH5647> him also to serve

וְעָבְד֤וּ <WH5647> shall serve אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> And all nations וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> him and his son וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> בֶּן־ <WH1121> and his son's בְּנ֑וֹ <WH1121> son עַ֣ד <WH5704> until בֹּא־ <WH935> come עֵ֤ת <WH6256> until the very time אַרְצוֹ֙ <WH776> of his land גַּם־ <WH1571> again ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְעָ֤בְדוּ <WH5647> shall serve בוֹ֙ גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> and then many וּמְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> kings גְּדֹלִֽים׃ <WH1419> and great

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become הַגּ֜וֹי <WH1471> And it shall come to pass [that] the nation וְהַמַּמְלָכָ֗ה <WH4467> and kingdom אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יַעַבְד֤וּ <WH5647> which will not serve אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> אֶת־ <WH853> נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֣ר <WH5019> the same Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> and which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יִתֵּן֙ <WH5414> and that will not put אֶת־ <WH853> צַוָּאר֔וֹ <WH6677> their neck בְּעֹ֖ל <WH5923> under the yoke מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> of Babylon בַּחֶרֶב֩ <WH2719> with the sword וּבָרָעָ֨ב <WH7458> and with the famine וּבַדֶּ֜בֶר <WH1698> and with the pestilence אֶפְקֹ֨ד <WH6485> will I punish עַל־ <WH5921> that הַגּ֤וֹי <WH1471> that nation הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַד־ <WH5704> until תֻּמִּ֥י <WH8552> until I have consumed אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> them by his hand

וְ֠אַתֶּם <WH859> you אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁמְע֨וּ <WH8085> Therefore hearken אֶל־ <WH413> to נְבִיאֵיכֶ֜ם <WH5030> not ye to your prophets וְאֶל־ <WH413> about קֹֽסְמֵיכֶ֗ם <WH7080> nor to your diviners וְאֶל֙ <WH413> about חֲלֹמֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH2472> nor to your dreamers וְאֶל־ <WH413> about עֹֽנְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6049> nor to your enchanters וְאֶל־ <WH413> about כַּשָּׁפֵיכֶ֑ם <WH3786> nor to your sorcerers אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הֵ֞ם <WH1992> like אֹמְרִ֤ים <WH559> which speak אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH413> to you לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto you saying לֹ֥א <WH3808> You will not תַעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> Ye shall not serve אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> a lie הֵ֖ם <WH1992> they נִבְּאִ֣ים <WH5012> For they prophesy לָכֶ֑ם לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> order הַרְחִ֤יק <WH7368> unto you to remove you far אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from אַדְמַתְכֶ֔ם <WH127> from your land וְהִדַּחְתִּ֥י <WH5080> and that I should drive you out אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> וַאֲבַדְתֶּֽם׃ <WH6> and ye should perish

וְהַגּ֗וֹי <WH1471> But the nations אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יָבִ֧יא <WH935> that bring אֶת־ <WH853> צַוָּאר֛וֹ <WH6677> their neck בְּעֹ֥ל <WH5923> under the yoke מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon וַֽעֲבָד֑וֹ <WH5647> and serve וְהִנַּחְתִּ֤יו <WH3240> him those will I let remain still עַל־ <WH5921> on אַדְמָתוֹ֙ <WH127> in their own land נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַֽעֲבָדָ֖הּ <WH5647> and they shall till וְיָ֥שַׁב <WH3427> it and dwell בָּֽהּ׃

וְאֶל־ <WH413> to צִדְקִיָּ֤ה <WH6667> also to Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> I spake כְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> according to all these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הָבִ֨יאוּ <WH935> Bring אֶת־ <WH853> צַוְּארֵיכֶ֜ם <WH6677> your necks בְּעֹ֣ל <WH5923> under the yoke מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֗ל <WH894> of Babylon וְעִבְד֥וּ <WH5647> and serve אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> וְעַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> him and his people וִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <WH2421> and live

לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why תָמ֙וּתוּ֙ <WH4191> Why will ye die אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you וְעַמֶּ֔ךָ <WH5971> thou and thy people בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> by the sword בָּרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> by the famine וּבַדָּ֑בֶר֙ <WH1698> and by the pestilence כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> hath spoken יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to הַגּ֕וֹי <WH1471> against the nation אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יַעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> that will not serve אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> Babel

וְאַֽל־ <WH408> nay תִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <WH8085> Therefore hearken אֶל־ <WH413> to דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> not unto the words הַנְּבִאִ֗ים <WH5030> of the prophets הָאֹמְרִ֤ים <WH559> that speak אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH413> to you לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto you saying לֹ֥א <WH3808> You will not תַעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> Ye shall not serve אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> of Babylon כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> a lie הֵ֖ם <WH1992> they נִבְּאִ֥ים <WH5012> for they prophesy לָכֶֽם׃

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> have not שְׁלַחְתִּים֙ <WH7971> For I have not sent נְאֻם־ <WH5002> them saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְהֵ֛ם <WH1992> they נִבְּאִ֥ים <WH5012> yet they prophesy בִּשְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> in my name לַשָּׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> a lie לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> order הַדִּיחִ֤י <WH5080> that I might drive you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> וַאֲבַדְתֶּ֔ם <WH6> and that ye might perish אַתֶּ֕ם <WH859> you וְהַנְּבִאִ֖ים <WH5030> ye and the prophets הַֽנִּבְּאִ֥ים <WH5012> that prophesy לָכֶֽם׃

וְאֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֲנִים֩ <WH3548> to the priests וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֨ם <WH5971> and to all this people הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> this דִּבַּ֣רְתִּי <WH1696> Also I spake לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying כֹּה֮ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> the LORD אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <WH8085> Hearken אֶל־ <WH413> to דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> not to the words נְבִֽיאֵיכֶ֗ם <WH5030> of your prophets הַֽנִּבְּאִ֤ים <WH5012> that prophesy לָכֶם֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto you saying הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold כְלֵ֧י <WH3627> Behold the vessels בֵית־ <WH1004> house יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S מוּשָׁבִ֥ים <WH7725> be brought again מִבָּבֶ֖לָה <WH894> from Babylon עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> will now מְהֵרָ֑ה <WH4120> shall now shortly כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> a lie הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> who נִבְּאִ֥ים <WH5012> for they prophesy לָכֶֽם׃

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Hearken אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to עִבְד֥וּ <WH5647> not unto them serve אֶת־ <WH853> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon וִֽחְי֑וּ <WH2421> and live לָ֧מָּה <WH4100> Why תִֽהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> become הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> wherefore should this city הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise חָרְבָּֽה׃ <WH2723> desolation

וְאִם־ <WH518> if נְבִאִ֣ים <WH5030> But if they [be] prophets הֵ֔ם <WH1992> like וְאִם־ <WH518> and if יֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> be דְּבַר־ <WH1697> and if the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אִתָּ֑ם <WH854> for יִפְגְּעוּ־ <WH6293> with them let them now make intercession נָא֙ <WH4994> now בַּֽיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> to the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לְבִלְתִּי־ <WH1115> may not בֹ֜אוּ <WH935> go הַכֵּלִ֣ים ׀ <WH3627> that the vessels הַנּוֹתָרִ֣ים <WH3498> which are left בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּבֵ֨ית <WH1004> and [in] the house מֶ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> and at Jerusalem בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> not to Babylon פ

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֶל־ <WH413> concerning הָֽעַמֻּדִ֔ים <WH5982> concerning the pillars וְעַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> and concerning the sea וְעַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַמְּכֹנ֑וֹת <WH4350> and concerning the bases וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and concerning יֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> and concerning the residue הַכֵּלִ֔ים <WH3627> of the vessels הַנּוֹתָרִ֖ים <WH3498> that remain בָּעִ֥יר <WH5892> in this city הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise
